title: Lewis & Clark National Historic Trail: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail (NHT). Your donation will enhance the programs and activities that protect park resources and provide services to trail visitors. It will help ensure the stories and lessons of the Expedition continue. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support. Making a Donation: The trail is able to accept direct donations. You may do so by contacting Superintendent, Mark Weekley, by phone 402-661-1806 or e-mail at e-mail us Donations may also be sent to the trail office to this address: Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail 601 Riverfront Drive Omaha, NE 68102
